methods.name: GetPosts
methods.code:
{
            return db.Posts
                .AsNoTracking()
                .Include(p => p.Ecole)
                .Include(p => p.PostObjects)
                .Include(p => p.PostObjects.Select(po => po.UploadedFile))
                .Include(p => p.PostTags)
                .Include(p => p.PostLikes)
                .Include(p => p.PostWorkgroups)
                .Include(p => p.Comments.Select(c => c.CommentObjects))
                .Include(p => p.Comments.Select(c => c.CommentLikes))
                .Where(p => p.DateDelete == null || p.DateDelete >= DateTime.Now)
                .Where(p => p.Ecole.OrganismeId == organismeId);
        }

methods.name: GetUserMapEventExpression
methods.code:
{
            return eue => new ParticipatingUserViewModel
            {
                UserId = eue.User.Id,
                Pseudo = eue.User.Pseudo,
                ProfilePicture = (eue.User.FileIdPhotoProfil != null) ? eue.User.UploadedFile_FileIdPhotoProfil.FileUrl : eue.User.PhotoProfil,
                CoverPicture = (eue.User.FileIdHeaderProfil != null) ? eue.User.UploadedFile_FileIdHeaderProfil.FileUrl : eue.User.HeaderProfil,
                Internal = eue.User.Interne,
                UserType = eue.User.EcoleUsers.Where(eu => eu.EcoleId == ecoleId)
                                            .Select(eux => new NewsfeedUserTypeV3ViewModel
                                            {
                                                Code = eux.UserType.Code,
                                                Label = eux.UserType.Libelle
                                            }).FirstOrDefault(),
                Promotions = eue.User.InscriptionPromotions
                                              .Where(inscPromo =>
                                                         (inscPromo.DateDelete == null || inscPromo.DateDelete > DateTime.Now)
                                                         && ((inscPromo.DateFinAcces == null
                                                              && inscPromo.Promotion.DateFinPromo > DateTime.Now)
                                                             || inscPromo.DateFinAcces > DateTime.Now))
                                              .Select(ip => new NewsfeedUserPromotionV3ViewModel
                                              {
                                                  PromotionId = ip.PromotionId,
                                                  Promotion = ip.Promotion.Libelle,
                                                  Parcours = ip.Promotion.Parcour.Titre,
                                                  CodeParcours = ip.Promotion.Parcour.Code,
                                                  Session = ip.Promotion.Session
                                              }).ToList(),
                Attendance = eue.Presence
            };
        }

methods.name: GetPostV2MapExpression
methods.code:
{
            return post => new NewsfeedPostViewModel
            {
                PostId = post.Id,
                Created = post.DateCreate,
                Body = post.Body,
                IsPinned = post.IsSticky,
                Likers = post.PostLikes.Select(postLike => new NewsfeedUserViewModel
                {
                    UserId = postLike.User.Id,
                    Pseudo = postLike.User.Pseudo,
                    ProfilePicture = (postLike.User.FileIdPhotoProfil != null) ? postLike.User.UploadedFile_FileIdPhotoProfil.FileUrl : postLike.User.PhotoProfil,
                    CoverPicture = (postLike.User.FileIdHeaderProfil != null) ? postLike.User.UploadedFile_FileIdHeaderProfil.FileUrl : postLike.User.HeaderProfil,
                    Internal = postLike.User.Interne,
                    UserType = postLike.User.EcoleUsers.Where(eu => eu.EcoleId == ecoleId)
                        .Select(eu => new NewsfeedUserTypeViewModel
                        {
                            Code = eu.UserType.Code,
                            Label = eu.UserType.Libelle
                        }).FirstOrDefault(),
                    Promotions = postLike.User.InscriptionPromotions
                        .Where(inscPromo => inscPromo.EcoleId == ecoleId
                                            && (inscPromo.DateDelete == null || inscPromo.DateDelete > DateTime.Now)
                                            && ((inscPromo.DateFinAcces == null && inscPromo.Promotion.DateFinPromo > DateTime.Now) || inscPromo.DateFinAcces > DateTime.Now))
                        .Select(ip => new NewsfeedUserPromotionViewModel
                        {
                            PromotionId = ip.PromotionId,
                            Promotion = ip.Promotion.Libelle,
                            Parcours = ip.Promotion.Parcour.Titre,
                            CodeParcours = ip.Promotion.Parcour.Code,
                            Session = ip.Promotion.Session
                        })
                }),
                Liked = post.PostLikes.Any(pl => pl.UserId == userId),
                User = new NewsfeedUserViewModel
                {
                    UserId = post.User.Id,
                    Pseudo = post.User.Pseudo,
                    ProfilePicture = (post.User.FileIdPhotoProfil != null) ? post.User.UploadedFile_FileIdPhotoProfil.FileUrl : post.User.PhotoProfil,
                    CoverPicture = (post.User.FileIdHeaderProfil != null) ? post.User.UploadedFile_FileIdHeaderProfil.FileUrl : post.User.HeaderProfil,
                    Internal = post.User.Interne,
                    UserType =
                        post.User.EcoleUsers.Where(eu => eu.EcoleId == ecoleId)
                            .Select(eux => new NewsfeedUserTypeViewModel
                            {
                                Code = eux.UserType.Code,
                                Label = eux.UserType.Libelle
                            }).FirstOrDefault(),
                    Promotions =
                        post.User.InscriptionPromotions
                            .Where(inscPromo => inscPromo.EcoleId == ecoleId
                                                && (inscPromo.DateDelete == null || inscPromo.DateDelete > DateTime.Now)
                                                && ((inscPromo.DateFinAcces == null && inscPromo.Promotion.DateFinPromo > DateTime.Now) || inscPromo.DateFinAcces > DateTime.Now))
                            .Select(ip => new NewsfeedUserPromotionViewModel
                            {
                                PromotionId = ip.PromotionId,
                                Promotion = ip.Promotion.Libelle,
                                Parcours = ip.Promotion.Parcour.Titre,
                                CodeParcours = ip.Promotion.Parcour.Code,
                                Session = ip.Promotion.Session
                            })
                },
                PostObjects = post.PostObjects.Select(po => new NewsfeedAttachmentViewModel
                {
                    Filename = (po.FileId != null) ? po.UploadedFile.FileUrl : po.Filename,
                    Label = (po.FileId != null) ? po.UploadedFile.FileName : po.Libelle
                }),
                Comments = post.Comments.Select(c => new NewsfeedCommentViewModel
                {
                    CommentId = c.Id,
                    Created = c.DateCreate,
                    Body = c.Text,
                    Liked = c.CommentLikes.Any(cl => cl.UserId == userId),
                    Likers = c.CommentLikes.Select(cl => new NewsfeedUserViewModel
                    {
                        UserId = cl.User.Id,
                        Pseudo = cl.User.Pseudo,
                        ProfilePicture = (cl.User.FileIdPhotoProfil != null) ? cl.User.UploadedFile_FileIdPhotoProfil.FileUrl : cl.User.PhotoProfil,
                        CoverPicture = (cl.User.FileIdHeaderProfil != null) ? cl.User.UploadedFile_FileIdHeaderProfil.FileUrl : cl.User.HeaderProfil,
                        Internal = cl.User.Interne,
                        UserType = cl.User.EcoleUsers.Where(eu => eu.EcoleId == ecoleId)
                            .Select(eu => new NewsfeedUserTypeViewModel
                            {
                                Code = eu.UserType.Code,
                                Label = eu.UserType.Libelle
                            }).FirstOrDefault(),
                        Promotions = cl.User.InscriptionPromotions
                            .Where(inscriptionPromotion =>
                                inscriptionPromotion.EcoleId == ecoleId
                                && (inscriptionPromotion.DateDelete == null || inscriptionPromotion.DateDelete > DateTime.Now)
                                && ((inscriptionPromotion.DateFinAcces == null
                                     && inscriptionPromotion.Promotion.DateFinPromo > DateTime.Now)
                                    || inscriptionPromotion.DateFinAcces > DateTime.Now))
                            .Select(ip => new NewsfeedUserPromotionViewModel
                            {
                                PromotionId = ip.PromotionId,
                                Promotion = ip.Promotion.Libelle,
                                Parcours = ip.Promotion.Parcour.Titre,
                                CodeParcours = ip.Promotion.Parcour.Code,
                                Session = ip.Promotion.Session
                            })
                    }),
                    User = new NewsfeedUserViewModel
                    {
                        UserId = c.User.Id,
                        Pseudo = c.User.Pseudo,
                        ProfilePicture = (c.User.FileIdPhotoProfil != null) ? c.User.UploadedFile_FileIdPhotoProfil.FileUrl : c.User.PhotoProfil,
                        CoverPicture = (c.User.FileIdHeaderProfil != null) ? c.User.UploadedFile_FileIdHeaderProfil.FileUrl : c.User.HeaderProfil,
                        Internal = c.User.Interne,
                        UserType =
                            c.User.EcoleUsers.Where(eu => eu.EcoleId == ecoleId)
                                .Select(eux => new NewsfeedUserTypeViewModel
                                {
                                    Code = eux.UserType.Code,
                                    Label = eux.UserType.Libelle
                                }).FirstOrDefault(),
                        Promotions =
                            c.User.InscriptionPromotions
                                .Where(inscriptionPromotion =>
                                    inscriptionPromotion.EcoleId == ecoleId
                                    && (inscriptionPromotion.DateDelete == null || inscriptionPromotion.DateDelete > DateTime.Now)
                                    && ((inscriptionPromotion.DateFinAcces == null
                                         && inscriptionPromotion.Promotion.DateFinPromo > DateTime.Now)
                                        || inscriptionPromotion.DateFinAcces > DateTime.Now))
                                .Select(ip => new NewsfeedUserPromotionViewModel
                                {
                                    PromotionId = ip.PromotionId,
                                    Promotion = ip.Promotion.Libelle,
                                    Parcours = ip.Promotion.Parcour.Titre,
                                    CodeParcours = ip.Promotion.Parcour.Code,
                                    Session = ip.Promotion.Session
                                })
                    },
                    CommentObjects = c.CommentObjects.Select(co => new NewsfeedAttachmentViewModel
                    {
                        Filename = (co.FileId != null) ? co.UploadedFile.FileUrl : co.Filename,
                        Label = (co.FileId != null) ? co.UploadedFile.FileName : co.Libelle
                    })
                }).OrderBy(c => c.Created),
                HTP = post.HideToProspects
            };
        }

methods.name: GetPostMapExpression
methods.code:
{
            return post => new NewsfeedPostV3ViewModel
            {
                PostId = post.Id,
                Created = post.DateCreate,
                Updated = post.DateUpdate,

                //Audience = post.PostWorkgroups.Select(pw => pw.WorkgroupId).ToList(),
                IsPublic = !post.PostWorkgroups.Any() || post.PostWorkgroups.Count == 1 && post.PostWorkgroups.FirstOrDefault().Workgroup.Ecoles.Any(),
                Body = post.Body,
                IsPinned = post.IsSticky,
                IsFormationTab = post.IsFormationTab,
                Likers = post.PostLikes
                    .Select(pl => pl.UserId)
                    .ToList(),
                Liked = post.PostLikes
                    .Any(pl => pl.UserId == userId),
                User = post.User.Id,
                Views = post.ViewsCount,
                Seen = post.PostViews
                    .Any(pl => pl.UserId == userId),
                PostObjects = post.PostObjects
                    .Select(po => new NewsfeedAttachmentV3ViewModel
                    {
                        Filename = (po.FileId != null) ? po.UploadedFile.FileUrl : po.Filename,
                        Label = (po.FileId != null) ? po.UploadedFile.FileName : po.Libelle
                    })
                    .ToList(),
                Comments = post.Comments
                    .Where(c => c.DateDelete == null || c.DateDelete > DateTime.Now)
                    .Select(c => new NewsfeedCommentV3ViewModel
                    {
                        CommentId = c.Id,
                        Created = c.DateCreate,
                        Body = c.Text,
                        Liked = c.CommentLikes
                            .Any(cl => cl.UserId == userId),
                        Likers = c.CommentLikes
                            .Select(cl => cl.UserId)
                            .ToList(),
                        User = c.UserId,
                        CommentObjects = c.CommentObjects
                            .Select(co => new NewsfeedAttachmentV3ViewModel
                            {
                                Filename = (co.FileId != null) ? co.UploadedFile.FileUrl : co.Filename,
                                Label = (co.FileId != null) ? co.UploadedFile.FileName : co.Libelle
                            })
                            .ToList()
                    })
                    .OrderBy(c => c.Created)
                    .ToList(),
                HTP = post.HideToProspects
            };
        }

methods.name: GetUserMapExpression
methods.code:
{
            return user => new NewsfeedUserV3ViewModel
            {
                UserId = user.Id,
                Pseudo = user.Pseudo,
                ProfilePicture = (user.FileIdPhotoProfil != null) ? user.UploadedFile_FileIdPhotoProfil.FileUrl : user.PhotoProfil,
                CoverPicture = (user.FileIdHeaderProfil != null) ? user.UploadedFile_FileIdHeaderProfil.FileUrl : user.HeaderProfil,
                Internal = user.Interne,
                UserType = user.EcoleUsers
                    .OrderByDescending(eu => schoolIdsList.Contains(eu.EcoleId)) // Permet de prendre en premier l'EcoleUsers de l'école courante, sinon une autre
                    .Select(eux => new NewsfeedUserTypeV3ViewModel
                    {
                        Code = eux.UserType.Code,
                        Label = eux.UserType.Libelle
                    })
                    .FirstOrDefault(),
                Promotions = user.InscriptionPromotions
                    .Where(inscPromo => schoolIdsList.Contains(inscPromo.EcoleId)
                        && (inscPromo.DateDelete == null || inscPromo.DateDelete > DateTime.Now)
                        && ((inscPromo.DateFinAcces == null
                        && inscPromo.Promotion.DateFinPromo > DateTime.Now)
                        || inscPromo.DateFinAcces > DateTime.Now))
                    .Select(ip => new NewsfeedUserPromotionV3ViewModel
                    {
                        PromotionId = ip.PromotionId,
                        Promotion = ip.Promotion.Libelle,
                        Parcours = ip.Promotion.Parcour.Titre,
                        CodeParcours = ip.Promotion.Parcour.Code,
                        Session = ip.Promotion.Session
                    })
                    .ToList(),
                IsFromCurrentSchool = user.EcoleUsers
                    .Any(eu => schoolIdsList.Contains(eu.EcoleId))
            };
        }

methods.name: GetConnectionHubV2UserMapExpression
methods.code:
{
            return user => new ConnectionHubUser
            {
                UserId = user.Id,
                Pseudo = user.Pseudo,
                ProfilePicture = (user.FileIdPhotoProfil != null) ? user.UploadedFile_FileIdPhotoProfil.FileUrl : user.PhotoProfil,
                CoverPicture = (user.FileIdHeaderProfil != null) ? user.UploadedFile_FileIdHeaderProfil.FileUrl : user.HeaderProfil,
                Internal = user.Interne,
                UserType = user.EcoleUsers.Where(eu => eu.EcoleId == ecoleId)
                                              .Select(eux => new NewsfeedUserTypeV3ViewModel
                                              {
                                                  Code = eux.UserType.Code,
                                                  Label = eux.UserType.Libelle
                                              }).FirstOrDefault(),
                LastConnectionDate = user.EcoleUsers.Where(eu => eu.EcoleId == ecoleId)
                                                        .Select(eux => eux.LastConnectionDate).FirstOrDefault(),
                LastDisconnectionDate = user.EcoleUsers.Where(eu => eu.EcoleId == ecoleId)
                                                           .Select(eux => eux.LastDisconnectionDate).FirstOrDefault(),
                PromotionsV2 = user.InscriptionPromotions
                                    .Where(inscPromo => inscPromo.EcoleId == ecoleId
                                        && (inscPromo.DateDelete == null || inscPromo.DateDelete > DateTime.Now)
                                        && ((inscPromo.DateFinAcces == null
                                        && inscPromo.Promotion.DateFinPromo > DateTime.Now)
                                        || inscPromo.DateFinAcces > DateTime.Now))
                                    .Select(ip => new NewsfeedUserPromotionV3ViewModel
                                    {
                                        PromotionId = ip.PromotionId,
                                        Promotion = ip.Promotion.Libelle,
                                        Parcours = ip.Promotion.Parcour.Titre,
                                        CodeParcours = ip.Promotion.Parcour.Code,
                                        Session = ip.Promotion.Session
                                    })
                                    .ToList(),
            };
        }

methods.name: EventIsLinkedToThesePromotionsIdsAndParcoursIdsOrThisUserIdIsOwner
methods.code:
{
            if (selectedParcoursId == 0 || selectedParcoursId == null)
            {
                return e => e.EventPromotions
                             .Any(ep => (ep.DateDelete == null || ep.DateDelete > DateTime.Now)
                                     && (
                                          (
                                            ep.PromotionId != null
                                            && ep.ParcoursId != null
                                            && promotionsIds.Contains(ep.PromotionId.Value)
                                            && parcoursIds.Contains(ep.ParcoursId.Value)
                                          )
                                          ||
                                          ( ////// partie à supprimer surement dans l'avenir car en base de prod, il n'existe que 3 lignes correspondant à ce cas
                                               ep.PromotionId != null
                                               && ep.ParcoursId == null
                                               && promotionsIds.Contains(ep.PromotionId.Value)
                                          ) //////
                                          ||
                                          (
                                               ep.PromotionId == null
                                               && ep.ParcoursId != null
                                               && parcoursIds.Contains(ep.ParcoursId.Value)
                                          )
                                        )
                                 )
                         || !e.EventPromotions
                              .Any(ep => ep.DateDelete == null || ep.DateDelete > DateTime.Now)
                         || e.OwnerUserId == currentUserIdThatCouldLeadALive;
            }
            else
            {
                return e => e.EventPromotions
                             .Any(ep => (ep.DateDelete == null || ep.DateDelete > DateTime.Now)
                                     && (
                                          (
                                            ep.PromotionId != null
                                            && ep.ParcoursId != null
                                            && promotionsIds.Contains(ep.PromotionId.Value)
                                            && parcoursIds.Contains(ep.ParcoursId.Value)
                                          )
                                          ||
                                          ( ////// partie à supprimer surement dans l'avenir car en base de prod, il n'existe que 3 lignes correspondant à ce cas
                                               ep.PromotionId != null
                                               && ep.ParcoursId == null
                                               && promotionsIds.Contains(ep.PromotionId.Value)
                                          ) //////
                                          ||
                                          (
                                               ep.PromotionId == null
                                               && ep.ParcoursId != null
                                               && parcoursIds.Contains(ep.ParcoursId.Value)
                                          )
                                        )
                                 );
            }

        }

methods.name: EventIsNotLinkedToThesePromotionsIdsAndParcoursIdsAndMatieresIdsAndThisUserIsNotOwner
methods.code:
{
            return e => e.OwnerUserId != currentUserIdThatCouldLeadALive
                     && (!(
                            e.EventMatieres
                             .Any(em => (em.DateDelete == null || em.DateDelete > DateTime.Now)
                                     && inProgressMatieresIds.Contains(em.MatiereId))
                            || !e.EventMatieres
                              .Any(em => em.DateDelete == null || em.DateDelete > DateTime.Now)
                          )
                         ||
                         !(
                                  e.EventPromotions
                                   .Any(ep => (ep.DateDelete == null || ep.DateDelete > DateTime.Now)
                                           && (
                                                   (
                                                     ep.PromotionId != null
                                                     && ep.ParcoursId != null
                                                     && inProgressPromotionsIds.Contains(ep.PromotionId.Value)
                                                     && userParcoursIds.Contains(ep.ParcoursId.Value)
                                                   )
                                                   ||
                                                   ( ////// partie à supprimer surement dans l'avenir car en base de prod, il n'existe que 3 lignes correspondant à ce cas
                                                        ep.PromotionId != null
                                                        && ep.ParcoursId == null
                                                        && inProgressPromotionsIds.Contains(ep.PromotionId.Value)
                                                   ) //////
                                                   ||
                                                   (
                                                        ep.PromotionId == null
                                                        && ep.ParcoursId != null
                                                        && userParcoursIds.Contains(ep.ParcoursId.Value)
                                                   )
                                                 )
                                          )
                               || !e.EventPromotions
                                     .Any(ep => ep.DateDelete == null || ep.DateDelete > DateTime.Now)
                          )
                        );
        }

methods.name: SearchValueCorrespondsIfItExistsToTheEventTitleOrEventOwners
methods.code:
{
            // Code Moche pour corriger la recherche des lives
            // Trouver quelque chose de plus propre
            // L'idéal serait de changer la collation des colonnes requêtées directement en base de données
            // Cela impliquerait le passage d'une migration depuis le projet LMS Database
            if (!string.IsNullOrEmpty(searchValue))
            {
                return e => (e.User.Nom).ToLower()
                                        .Replace("à", "a")
                                        .Replace("â", "a")
                                        .Replace("ç", "c")
                                        .Replace("é", "e")
                                        .Replace("è", "e")
                                        .Replace("ë", "e")
                                        .Replace("ê", "e")
                                        .Replace("î", "i")
                                        .Replace("ï", "i")
                                        .Replace("ö", "o")
                                        .Replace("ô", "o")
                                        .Replace("ù", "u")
                                        .Contains(searchValue)
                         || (e.User.Prenom).ToLower()
                                           .Replace("à", "a")
                                           .Replace("â", "a")
                                           .Replace("ç", "c")
                                           .Replace("é", "e")
                                           .Replace("è", "e")
                                           .Replace("ë", "e")
                                           .Replace("ê", "e")
                                           .Replace("î", "i")
                                           .Replace("ï", "i")
                                           .Replace("ö", "o")
                                           .Replace("ô", "o")
                                           .Replace("ù", "u")
                                           .Contains(searchValue)
                         || (e.User.Pseudo).ToLower()
                                           .Replace("à", "a")
                                           .Replace("â", "a")
                                           .Replace("ç", "c")
                                           .Replace("é", "e")
                                           .Replace("è", "e")
                                           .Replace("ë", "e")
                                           .Replace("ê", "e")
                                           .Replace("î", "i")
                                           .Replace("ï", "i")
                                           .Replace("ö", "o")
                                           .Replace("ô", "o")
                                           .Replace("ù", "u")
                                           .Contains(searchValue)
                         || ((e.User.Nom + " " + e.User.Prenom)).ToLower()
                                                                .Replace("à", "a")
                                                                .Replace("â", "a")
                                                                .Replace("ç", "c")
                                                                .Replace("é", "e")
                                                                .Replace("è", "e")
                                                                .Replace("ë", "e")
                                                                .Replace("ê", "e")
                                                                .Replace("î", "i")
                                                                .Replace("ï", "i")
                                                                .Replace("ö", "o")
                                                                .Replace("ô", "o")
                                                                .Replace("ù", "u")
                                                                .Contains(searchValue)
                         || ((e.User.Prenom + " " + e.User.Nom)).ToLower()
                                                                .Replace("à", "a")
                                                                .Replace("â", "a")
                                                                .Replace("ç", "c")
                                                                .Replace("é", "e")
                                                                .Replace("è", "e")
                                                                .Replace("ë", "e")
                                                                .Replace("ê", "e")
                                                                .Replace("î", "i")
                                                                .Replace("ï", "i")
                                                                .Replace("ö", "o")
                                                                .Replace("ô", "o")
                                                                .Replace("ù", "u")
                                                                .Contains(searchValue)
                         || e.Titre.ToLower()
                                   .Replace("à", "a")
                                   .Replace("â", "a")
                                   .Replace("ç", "c")
                                   .Replace("é", "e")
                                   .Replace("è", "e")
                                   .Replace("ë", "e")
                                   .Replace("ê", "e")
                                   .Replace("î", "i")
                                   .Replace("ï", "i")
                                   .Replace("ö", "o")
                                   .Replace("ô", "o")
                                   .Replace("ù", "u")
                                   .Contains(searchValue);


                //return e => e.User.Nom.ToLower().Contains(searchValue)
                //         || e.User.Prenom.ToLower().Contains(searchValue)
                //         || e.User.Pseudo.ToLower().Contains(searchValue)
                //         || (e.User.Nom + " " + e.User.Prenom).ToLower().Contains(searchValue)
                //         || (e.User.Prenom + " " + e.User.Nom).ToLower().Contains(searchValue)
                //         || e.Titre.ToLower().Contains(searchValue);
            }

            return e => 1 == 1;
        }
